page.title: 16Notable Events in Westhill
page.content: We interviewed people and asked them what they thought was the most well known event within our area. The most popular answer was the{Westhill Gala.} The Westhill Gala is an entertainment organised by the Westhill Round Table It has 7-a-side football tournament & side stalls. There are also dances and discos over this June weekend. The golf club in westhill has at least three tournaments a month in which lots of the district golfers try to win cups,medals and shields. Skene Highland Games take place every June at Skene football pitch.There is always a good turnout.Many football matches are played and games of tug of war take place.Ice cream is sold and many other refreshments as well. Westhill,a new garden suburb has very few events but it should grow in the next few years.
